Female.description: Female Ring-necked Pheasants have much smaller heads and shorter legs than a Greater Roadrunner. They show less dark streaking above and tend to occur in less dry habitats than roadrunners.

Adult.description: Scaled Quail share the Greater Roadrunner’s desert habitat, but are much smaller and shorter-legged, with a plain back and wings and a heavily scaled belly (roadrunners have unmarked bellies).
